name: A Date With Mio
description:
A very brief demo of a short game about a date with your high school girlfriend, Mio. The full game will contain about 4 potential dating spots, with different stuff to do there. As is, though, the demo should only take about a few minutes to go through, and is mostly a display of the game's general graphic style.

Mio's main sprite is a heavily modified version of Kana by Noraneko Games. More detailed information on the resources used within the game may be found in the in-game credits.
